name: King's Stool
description:
Many games feature kings but they never show the people behind him. In King's Stool, you play as the most neglected and important of all nobles, the "Groom of the Stool" and your job is to take care of the king's intestinal health.

For that purpose you'll need to gather and manage items, face dangerous creatures, test your intelligence and even defy death.

It won't be easy but such prestigious title demands commitment.

Features
  • 10 different types of gameplay, all skill based with no hand holding
  • 5 difficulty settings
  • 12 different kings each with their own perk
  • 3 different game modes
  • Hi-res medieval graphics
  • Authentic orchestral music
  • Secrets
